name: The Internship
description:
Description"The Internship" is a short Visual Novel created by BCH Waves studio. The story seems to be very interesting with some sexy details...PlotYoung talented student Carli applies for a job as an assistant to a business lady Jan. They are not gay, but one night may change their lives... Read and find out what happened once in an office!Main Characters


Jan


CarliMain Features
  • Relaxing background music

  • Many Steam Achievements

Just relax and enjoy the story
